subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}
{{Han compound|牛|攴|ls=ic|t1=cow|t2=a whip}} – to herd.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=mù
|c=muk6
|h=pfs=mu̍k
|md=mŭk/muŏk
|md_note=muŏk - only in the sense “to heal; to cure”
|mn=bo̍k
|mn-t=mog8
|w=5moq
|mc=y
|oc=y
|cat=v,n,pn
}}
